result.title: IOI Mini Training Contest 4
result.content:
I would like to invite you to the IOI mini training contest 4. The problems are from past NOI, POI and Andrew Stankevich contests. The problems are chosen to be slightly easier than the previous 3 contests, with 1 easy, 1 medium and 1 hard problem. Contest duration is 5 hours. It is scheduled to be held on August 2nd, 2016 at 18:30 MSK.

I hope you like the contest(I liked those problems very much). The problems I chose do not yet have editorials so I may write one if it is required after contest. Please make any suggestions in the comments. Special thanks to zscoder. GL and HF!!!
